body_html:
It is most likely somethings (e.g. batchnorm) are not set properly for is_training=False. However, since this is a departure from our official models, I would recommend using the official resnet models (https://github.com/tensorflow/models).

I am closing this bug now. If you have similar issues for the official models, please feel free to filea separate bug.

body:
It is most likely somethings (e.g. batchnorm) are not set properly for is_training=False. However, since this is a departure from our official models, I would recommend using the official resnet models (https://github.com/tensorflow/models).

I am closing this bug now. If you have similar issues for the official models, please feel free to filea separate bug.
